As India becomes a global tech hub, the demand for skilled AI and ML professionals has skyrocketed. Machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) are two of the most in-demand skills in the tech industry right now. With the ever-increasing amount of data being generated, there is a growing need for professionals who can use these technologies to make sense of it all. If you are eager to venture into this exciting realm of cutting-edge technology, look no further! In this answer, we will explore some of the top institutes in India offering courses in AI and Machine Learning. üöÄüíª Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay üéì: Being one of India's premier institutions, IIT Bombay offers comprehensive courses in AI and Machine Learning. Their curriculum encompasses mathematical foundations, algorithms, data analysis, and hands-on projects. With esteemed faculty members and state-of-the-art labs, IIT Bombay equips students with a robust understanding of AI and ML concepts. Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Madras üéì: IIT Madras is renowned for its AI and Machine Learning programs. The institute offers a range of courses, including specialized postgraduate degrees and short-term certificate courses. With a focus on real-world applications and industry-relevant projects, IIT Madras prepares students to excel in the ever-evolving field of AI and ML. International Institute of Information Technology (IIIT) Hyderabad üéì: IIIT Hyderabad has established itself as a prominent player in AI and ML education. The institute offers comprehensive courses that cover the fundamentals of AI, ML algorithms, natural language processing, and computer vision. IIIT Hyderabad's faculty consists of experts with extensive research and industry experience, ensuring a top-notch learning experience for students. Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur üéì: IIT Kharagpur offers an array of AI and ML courses that cater to diverse interests and expertise levels. Their programs focus on theory, practical implementation, and cutting-edge research. With collaborative projects and access to advanced labs, IIT Kharagpur nurtures the next generation of AI and ML experts. National Institute of Technology (NIT) Warangal üéì: NIT Warangal has earned recognition for its AI and ML courses that emphasize hands-on learning and practical applications. The institute's faculty members are renowned researchers and industry experts, providing students with exposure to the latest trends and technologies in AI and ML. Now lets look into top online courses available in India: Great Learning üöÄ: Great Learning is a leading ed-tech platform that offers specialized courses in AI and Machine Learning. They provide a range of flexible online programs, including bootcamps, master's courses, and specialized certifications. Great Learning's industry partnerships and expert faculty ensure that students gain practical skills and industry-relevant knowledge. Simplilearn üìö: Simplilearn is another prominent online learning platform that offers comprehensive AI and ML courses. They offer self-paced learning options as well as live virtual classes conducted by industry experts. Simplilearn's courses are designed to cater to both beginners and experienced professionals, making AI and ML education accessible to all. UpGrad üí°: UpGrad is a reputable online education platform offering specialized courses in AI and Machine Learning. Their programs cover various aspects of AI, including natural language processing, computer vision, and deep learning. UpGrad's curriculum is designed in collaboration with industry experts, ensuring students receive industry-relevant knowledge. TOP-G : Online Course for Working professionals: This is where Tutort Academy comes in. It is a leading online education platform that provides data science courses designed specifically for working professionals. It is a premier institute for Data Science and Machine Learning, offers a comprehensive curriculum, industry-oriented projects, and a blend of theory and practicals. They provide flexible learning options, mentorship, and career support. Here are some features that make them the best option for data science education: Limited batch sizes: They ensure that each batch has only 30-40 students, so every student feels more connected to their mentors and course. Real-time projects: They provide end-to-end real-time projects in various sectors that help students develop teamwork and problem-solving skills and enhance their ability to communicate effectively with others. These projects can also be added to their portfolio, impressing their recruiters. Placement support: They offer secured placement referrals that include guaranteed job calls from top MNCs, mock interview sessions with experts, and support to optimise their resume and LinkedIn profile. They have a history of 1000+ learners placed at top MNCs. Flexible pass: If students cannot learn continuously, They provide a flexible pass which helps them attend multiple batches with multiple mentors for two years with full-time access to their learning material . Microsoft Affiliated Course : This course is affiliated with Microsoft and is recognized by the top industry certifications. Upon completion of the course, you will receive a Microsoft Certified Certificate. They offer various data science courses that cater to different levels of expertise, from Non-Tech Background beginners to advanced IT professionals. Some of their popular courses are: Full Stack Data Science Master's Course Full Stack Artificial Intelligence and ML Course Data Structures and Algorithms Master's Course Advanced DSA & System Design Course Full Stack Specialisation In Software Development Full Stack DS & AI Master's Program for Tech & Business Leaders Working professionals should take data science courses from this academy because they are designed specifically to cater to their needs. More Key features that are in interest of Working professionals:- The extensive and industry-updated curriculum is delivered in the form of live and 1:1 interactive sessions by their experienced data scientists, lectures are attentive and informative because of the proper interaction possible with mentors in a class due to their limited batch strength. 2-Step counselling: This process allows them to identify if there courses are best in your interests and they provide top Data Scientist for your career counselling for free allowing you to understand what and how to shape your career. Top choice should be them if you are working professional. Conclusion India's educational landscape is brimming with opportunities to learn AI and Machine Learning from prestigious institutes and renowned online platforms. Whether you prefer traditional classroom settings or the flexibility of online learning, the options are abundant. Consider your personal preferences, career goals, and the depth of knowledge you seek when choosing an institute. Embark on an exciting journey in the realm of AI and ML, and equip yourself with the skills to shape the future of technology! üåüüìäüíª

Communicating fluently in English is a gradual process, one that takes a lot of practice and time to hone. In the meantime, the learning process can feel daunting: You want to get your meaning across correctly and smoothly, but putting your ideas into writing comes with the pressure of their feeling more permanent. This is why consistent, tailored suggestions are most helpful for improving your English writing abilities. Seeing specific writing suggestions based on common grammatical mistakes multilingual speakers make in English is key to improving your communication and English writing fluen Continue Reading Communicating fluently in English is a gradual process, one that takes a lot of practice and time to hone. In the meantime, the learning process can feel daunting: You want to get your meaning across correctly and smoothly, but putting your ideas into writing comes with the pressure of their feeling more permanent. This is why consistent, tailored suggestions are most helpful for improving your English writing abilities. Seeing specific writing suggestions based on common grammatical mistakes multilingual speakers make in English is key to improving your communication and English writing fluency. Regular feedback is powerful because writing in a language that isn‚Äôt the first one you learned poses extra challenges. It can feel extra frustrating when your ideas don‚Äôt come across as naturally as in your primary language. It‚Äôs also tough to put your writing out there when you‚Äôre not quite sure if your grammar and wording are correct. For those communicating in English in a professional setting, your ability to write effectively can make all the difference between collaboration and isolation, career progress and stagnation. Grammarly Premium helps multilingual speakers sound their best in English with tailored suggestions to improve grammar and idiomatic phrasing. Especially when you‚Äôre writing for work, where time often is in short supply, you want your communication to be effortless. In addition to offering general fluency assistance , Grammarly Premium now includes tailored suggestions for writing issues common among Spanish, Hindi, Mandarin, French, and German speakers, with more languages on the way. Features for all multilingual speakers Grammarly‚Äôs writing suggestions will catch the most common grammatical errors that multilingual speakers make in English. For example, if you drop an article or misuse a preposition (such as ‚Äúon‚Äù instead of ‚Äúin‚Äù), our sidebar will flag those mistakes within the Fix spelling and grammar category with the label Common issue for multilingual speakers . Most importantly, it will provide suggestions for fixing them. While these errors seem small, one right after another can make sentences awkward and more difficult to absorb. Eliminating them all in one fell swoop is a powerful way to put a more fluent spin on your document. Features for speakers of specific languages With Grammarly Premium , speakers of French, German, Hindi, Mandarin, and Spanish can get suggestions specifically tailored to their primary language, unlocking a whole other level of preciseness in written English. For speakers of those languages, our sidebar will flag ‚Äúfalse friends,‚Äù or cognates, which are words or phrases that have a similar form or sound in one‚Äôs primary language but don‚Äôt have the same meaning in English. But now Grammarly Premium‚Äôs writing suggestions will catch these types of errors for you and provide suggestions on how to fix them. You can find these suggestions in the Sound more fluent category in our floating sidebar. Simply click on the suggestion highlighted in green, and voila, your English will be more polished and accurate. PS: Tailored suggestions for other language backgrounds are on the way!

In India, the realm of machine learning and data science has witnessed significant growth , and as a result, numerous online courses have emerged to cater to the increasing demand for skilled professionals in these fields. These courses provide a diverse range of options for individuals seeking to delve into the exciting and dynamic domains of machine learning and data science. Several reputable platforms and educational institutions in India offer online courses that cover various aspects of machine learning and data science. These courses are designed to cater to learners with varying levels o Continue Reading In India, the realm of machine learning and data science has witnessed significant growth , and as a result, numerous online courses have emerged to cater to the increasing demand for skilled professionals in these fields. These courses provide a diverse range of options for individuals seeking to delve into the exciting and dynamic domains of machine learning and data science. Several reputable platforms and educational institutions in India offer online courses that cover various aspects of machine learning and data science. These courses are designed to cater to learners with varying levels of expertise, from beginners to advanced practitioners. Some of the key features that make these courses appealing include flexibility, accessibility, and the opportunity to learn from industry experts. Platforms collaborate with top universities and industry leaders to deliver high-quality content in the form of online courses, certifications, and even degree programs. These platforms cover a wide array of topics, including but not limited to: Foundations of Data Science : Introductory courses covering the basics of data analysis, statistics, and programming. Machine Learning Algorithms and Models : In-depth courses exploring various machine learning algorithms, techniques, and model building. Big Data Analytics : Courses focusing on processing and analyzing large datasets using tools like Apache Hadoop and Apache Spark. Deep Learning and Neural Networks : Advanced courses delving into the intricacies of deep learning, artificial neural networks, and their applications. Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Computer Vision : Specialized courses on processing and understanding human language and visual data. Business Intelligence and Data Visualization : Training on presenting data insights effectively using visualization tools. These courses often include hands-on projects, real-world case studies, and assessments to provide practical experience . Additionally, many of them offer forums and community support, fostering a collaborative learning environment. As the field of machine learning and data science evolves rapidly, these courses are frequently updated to incorporate the latest industry trends and technologies. This ensures that learners stay abreast of the cutting-edge developments in these dynamic fields. For someone looking to step into the world of machine learning and data science in India, the abundance of online courses provides a rich tapestry of learning options. Whether pursuing a career change or seeking to enhance existing skills, these courses offer a flexible and accessible pathway to acquiring valuable expertise in these in-demand domains. One such course provider is, Tutort Academy: They stand out as a premier online course provider in India, offering a comprehensive array of courses in machine learning and data science. Here are some key features that make them an excellent choice for aspiring professionals: Expert Instructors : They collaborate with industry experts and seasoned professionals to deliver courses. Learn from individuals with hands-on experience in the field, gaining insights into real-world applications. Flexible Learning Paths : Whether you're a beginner or an experienced practitioner, they offer courses tailored to various skill levels. Choose from introductory courses to advanced specializations based on your learning needs. Hands-On Projects : Dive into practical, hands-on projects that simulate real-world scenarios. Apply your knowledge and skills to solve industry-relevant problems, building a robust portfolio to showcase your capabilities. Industry-Relevant Curriculum : Their curriculum is meticulously designed to align with industry standards. Stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning and data science, ensuring your knowledge is cutting-edge and applicable in professional settings. Community Engagement : Connect with a vibrant community of learners and industry professionals through forums and networking events. Engage in discussions, share insights, and collaborate on projects, fostering a supportive and collaborative learning environment. Certifications and Recognitions : They provide certifications upon course completion, recognized by industry employers. Enhance your resume with credentials that validate your expertise in machine learning and data science. Interactive Learning Platform : Experience an intuitive and user-friendly learning platform that facilitates interactive learning. Access course materials, video lectures, and collaborative tools seamlessly, enhancing your overall learning experience. Continuous Updates : In the rapidly evolving fields of machine learning and data science, they ensure that its courses are regularly updated. Stay ahead of industry trends with content that reflects the latest advancements and best practices. Career Guidance : Benefit from their career services, including resume building, interview preparation, and job placement assistance. Leverage their network of industry connections to explore career opportunities in the field. Embark on your journey into machine learning and data science with them where knowledge meets skills and real-job opportunities, and excellence becomes a habit. Another alternative being, Udemy: Diverse Course Selection: They boast a vast library of courses, including an extensive collection in machine learning and data science. Learners can choose from a wide range of topics and skill levels. Self-Paced Learning: Udemy courses are designed for self-paced learning, accommodating various schedules. This flexibility enables learners to balance their professional and personal commitments. Limited Interactivity: Udemy's platform is primarily video-based, which may limit interactive elements compared to more sophisticated online learning platforms. Some learners may prefer a more engaging and interactive learning experience. Dependence on Individual Instructors: The effectiveness of a course on Udemy heavily relies on the skills and teaching style of the individual instructor. Some learners may find certain instructors more engaging and effective than others. TO conclude, embarking on your journey into machine learning and data science is a commendable endeavor. Best of luck in selecting a course that not only imparts valuable knowledge but also offers continuous support at every step of your learning experience. May your chosen path lead you to success in mastering these dynamic fields!

This will compound your gains and reduce risk Invest and not speculate. A long-term, sensible, plan, is always likely to beat trying to get into short-term trends. As an expat who might relocate in the future, you need a portable solution as you move around the world - Apply now for a portable, expat-focused, investment plan! Reinvest dividends. This makes a huge difference long-term Be diversified, especially when you are older. Putting all your eggs in one basket doesn‚Äôt make sense. The key differences about living abroad are: You usually can‚Äôt get access to your home countries social security system. Back home, investing 10% of whatever you make might be enough for retirement, because you are paying into the retirement system. Many expats panic when they are older, after not putting enough aside for themselves and their family in the previous years. Tax-efficient local investment vehicles, such as ISAs in the UK, aren‚Äôt usually available for expats, so offshore investing makes more sense for most non-American expats. For American expats, most forms of offshore investing have became too difficult due to PFIC and other rules Many people are on fixed-term contracts overseas. If you are a teacher back home, you can still have a position for life, or at least it is difficult to fire you. Overseas, you are often paid more, but are on two or three year contracts working in teaching, oil & gas, intergovernmental organizations etc. This makes saving and investing even more important. Many investment providers won‚Äôt accept for certain overseas countries. Even those who do, often have restrictions if you move again. So, finding a truly portable, global and expat-friendly provider is key. So, the same fundamentals apply, but the urgency is often bigger. For Americans living overseas, the complexity is just bigger. Pained by financial indecision? Want to start investing? Reach out for assistance today! This is one of the best course i was able to find if you want to cover both Machine Learning and Deep Learning or AI concepts. You can go through the Great Learning website and check different programs, they offer both online and offline program , opt for one that suits you.

There is no lack of machine learning, data science and AI courses in India. However, while searching for a machine learning course online or offline, you will end up with a pile of options and lots of confusion regarding which one to choose. Hence, it's not the concern of finding a machine learning course or an Ai course. Rather the concern becomes, with which course should you go? First, I will directly answer your question with the most profitable machine learning courses available in India. Next, I will provide a small list of the criteria you need to look into while choosing a machine learni Continue Reading There is no lack of machine learning, data science and AI courses in India. However, while searching for a machine learning course online or offline, you will end up with a pile of options and lots of confusion regarding which one to choose. Hence, it's not the concern of finding a machine learning course or an Ai course. Rather the concern becomes, with which course should you go? First, I will directly answer your question with the most profitable machine learning courses available in India. Next, I will provide a small list of the criteria you need to look into while choosing a machine learning or artificial intelligence certification course. You can find a total of 3 places or, better to say, three types of machine learning or AI courses in India. University Courses- Professional training institutional courses- Edtech platform online courses- University Course- Ideal for: Fresh graduates, students planning for B.tech degrees after high school, non-technical fresh undergraduates graduates planning to job-oriented graduations. Vellore Institute of Technology, Bhopal Course : B.Tech in CSE with specialisation in ML and AI How to take entry to the course: VITEEE scores. Fees of the course : approx 8.5 Lakh INR for 4 years. Key highlight:- This course is extensively focused on intelligence embedded systems, video analytics and computer vision- the three most demanding sub-field of the present days‚Äô machine learning job market. Jain University, Bangalore Course : B.Tech in CSE with specialisation in Artificial intelligence How to take entry to the course: straight enrollment as per the merit list and availability of seats. Fees of the course: approx 7.9 Lakh INR for 4 years. Key highlight:- This course is extensively focused on AI specialisation with plenty of field focused options such as Robotics, deep learning, speech recognition and conversational systems, process automation in robotics, in-depth study of CNN and RNN for NLP, etc. This college is best known for campus amongst all private colleges in India. Chandigarh University Course : BE in CSE with specialisation in Artificial intelligence and machine learning How to take entry to the course: Chandigarh University examination. Fees of the course: approx 7 Lakh INR for 4 years. Key highlight:- This course is associated with IBM specialisation and covers the following sub-field of AI: Neural Network algorithms, advanced machine learning algorithm types, modern approaches of data visualisations, the future of human-computer interactions, complex pattern identification and so on. This particular BE course of Chandigarh university is the most industry-oriented full-time Bachelor program available in India. You can also consider other university courses for B.Tech or BE in AI and ML: Indraprastha University, Delhi; DY Patil International University, Pune, and SRM University, Sonipat . 2. Professional training institutional courses- Ideal for: Ideal for working professionals seeking promotion through data science career transitions, working professionals from non-technical domain and holding bachelor or masters degree in hard natural sciences and want to shift toward the technical domain. Great Learning Course : PGP in Artificial intelligence and machine learning How to take entry to the course: Direct application through aptitude test followed by personal interview. Fees of the course: approx 2.3 INR for 12 months. Key highlight:- 12 months online course Specially designed for working professionals with apparent knowledge of coding and programming. (not for non-techies). Classes through recorded video sessions backed up with interactive and personalised online mentorship. Flexible graded assignment submission deadlines and timely feedback. The course is more focused on artificial neural networks and reinforced learning. Placement assistance through MNC job referrals and job fairs for 6 months after completion of the course. Guided capstone projects. Learnbay Courses : Domain Specialised certification in Data Science and AI, Advanced AI and ML certification, Data Science and AI program for Managers and Leaders. How to take entry to the course: Direct application through aptitude test followed by personal interview. Fees of the course: approx 65,000 INR to 79,000 INR depending on the course. Key highlight:- Tailored courses based on candidates' working grounds and years of experience, even for managers and leaders with 8+ years of experience. Option for classroom/online/blended learning. Courses available for both technical and non-technical working professionals. Special coding guidance (additional fee of cost classes) to the non-programmer. Complete career transitional AI and ML programs with domain elective studies. Live and interactive classes only. Personalised mentorship through 1 to 1 learning supports, data science career counselling. Placement assistance via practice interview sessions, dedicated job referrals until the onset of the final offer letter. Best ever continued learning assistance via lifetime access of all the premium study materials and recorded copies of attended classes. Even for 1 year, you can attend any of the live classes. The course modules are equally focused on building a strong AI and ML concept based and mastering the most advanced industrial applications of the same. 24*7 incite tech support. 6+ years experienced data scientist and industry leads with IIT-Roorkee and BITS Pilani background are the mentors. Course duration varies from 7.5 months to 11 months (based on the course you select). Exceptional Feature: The domain focused elective learning modules Each of the recommended machine learning course and artificial intelligence certification course of Learnbay offer elective domain oriented modules (the key to success for hight succes rate of lucrative data science career trainsion of experienced pros). At present the industrial domain training covered by Learnbay are Sales and marketing HRM Oil and gas energy Construction and Telecommunication Hospitality and shipments Finance and banking Retail and ecommerce Medical research and healthcare Specially, I would recommend working pros associated with Construction & Telecommunication and Hospitality and shipments to definitely go for Learnbay courses. The sub-modules of telecom and construction help you to master on Big data analytical applications to track subscriber behaviorious orientation. If you want to learn ML or AI in India then, you have two learning options which are: Enrolling in college courses Enrolling in training courses Who can enroll in college courses? The learners who want to pursue their masters and have a desire for research in ML and AI can opt for the college courses. For this you have to clear the national level examination known as GATE with a very good rank under 500. This will help you to secure a good college for your masters program. Some of the best colleges which you will get are all IITs, NITs and IIITs. Though there are many other private and CFTIs colleg Continue Reading If you want to learn ML or AI in India then, you have two learning options which are: Enrolling in college courses Enrolling in training courses Who can enroll in college courses? The learners who want to pursue their masters and have a desire for research in ML and AI can opt for the college courses. For this you have to clear the national level examination known as GATE with a very good rank under 500. This will help you to secure a good college for your masters program. Some of the best colleges which you will get are all IITs, NITs and IIITs. Though there are many other private and CFTIs colleges that offer courses for ML and AI but I won‚Äôt suggest you to go with them as they are not worth it as ML and AI are trending new technical skills whose course curriculum are not designed in a good way in private and CFTIs colleges. The course fees for the two year duration in IITs, NITs and IIITs will land you approx. over 5-6 lacs. Moreover, in many colleges you will need to clear the written test and interview part so be prepared for that. Who can enroll in a training course? All working professionals whose aim is to either get a good job or want to make a career transition in top companies in a job oriented short term course curriculum can enroll themselves in the training institute courses. In training courses, you will learn everything about ML and AI in designated duration as per the current industry demands unlike the 2 year rigorous masters program. Moreover, the learners who are not able to clear the GATE exam and have financial restrictions can also harness their ML and AI skills from the training courses. What is my suggestion? I will highly suggest you to fully learn ML and AI from training courses rather than going for a masters program because of the following reasons: Extra years of study and burden: Many of my friends enrolled in the masters program in good IITs and IIITs which they left the course program because of the extra burden of research work which restricted their exposure. Yes, there are many students who drop out from the masters program because of the high research work in top colleges especially in the IITs in which they were unable to match up with the other peers. Also, the devotion of a full 2 years in a masters program is very difficult. Highly competitive entrance exam of GATE: The GATE exam is very difficult in nature in which you have to prepare the 10 subjects of your engineering branch with the addition of two other subjects engineering mathematics and general aptitude. This sums up 12 subjects which requires one to learn the concepts, make the notes, revise the concepts, solve the previous year questions, solve practice questions, give test series and analysis which is very difficult and can‚Äôt be done by everyone. Very high course fees for 2 year duration: Top IITs fees are affordable in nature while that of new IITs, all NITs and all IIITs fees are very high which is not economical in nature. Hence, it is better to proceed your learning of ML and AI through training institute courses which are offered by top training institutes such as Tutort Academy which will help you to learn ML and AI from India‚Äôs best minds with greater affordability, flexibility and 100% placement guaranteed support. Moreover, by this flexible pass you can also enroll yourself into multiple batches to learn with multiple educators. Two step counseling The institute offers an initial profile review facility which is reviewed by the top industry experts who will help you to select the best cited course according to your profile and future career needs.
